Open the page on the Jumia App
Guess the Tech words correctly in 6 attempts
Each guess must be a valid six-letter word. Hit the enter button to submit.

After each guess the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word. A red color implies the letter is not in the word in any spot. A brown color implies the letter is in the word but in the wrong spot. An orange color implies the letter is in the word and in the correct spot.
A red color gives you 0 points a brown color gives you 2 points an orange color gives you 5 points

The addition of all your points divided by the number of attempts gives you your overall score. Example: if you attempted 6 times and the sum total of your points from the colors you got is 30 your overall score will be 5
The person with the highest score wins the prize for the day. If there's a tie the person with the highest score who submitted his entry earlier wins

question: What is Jumia Express
answer: Jumia Express items are stored in Jumia's warehouse which ensures very fast delivery no out of stock cancellations and highest standards of quality storage. Jumia Express items are delivered with the same shipping charges as the other products and does not require any subscription: choosing jumia express items ensures you get premium services without extra charges!

question: Is Jumia Express available for all products
answer: Jumia Express is only available for selected products. To find out if a product is available with Jumia Express or not simply look for the Jumia Express logo on the product page. You can also use the Jumia Express filter to only see items available with Jumia Express.

question: Are faster service options like Jumia Express available for returns?
answer: Yes our timelines for picking up your retuned items (whetherJumia Express or not) are the same as the ones to deliver Jumia Express items.

question: How can I purchase items through Economy Postal Service?
answer:
Jumia selects a range of items and vendors that meet the eligibility criteria for Economy Postal Shipping. If an item/order is eligible you will be able to choose this option as the delivery method at checkout.

- This service is mainly available for certain low value products from selected sellers.
- If you purchase more than one item per seller and if one of them is not eligible for Economy Postal Shipping then we will offer you the standard shipping which offers faster delivery times.
- When the package is received in your country it will be delivered to you by the local postal service provider and not by Jumia. Since these items are shipped through postal providers at Jumia we have virtually no visibility on the status of your package.
- The Economy Postal Service will try to deliver the package to your address but in exceptional circumstances may ask you to collect the item from their nearest office.
- You may be required to pay additional customs duties on delivery.

For example: If you purchased an item on sale for ₦2000 while its original value was ₦4000 we will refund you ₦2000 i.e. the amount paid by you

question: Do I also get refunded the shipping charge when returning a product?
answer: For all local items the refunded amount will also include the shipping amount you were charged. For all Jumia Global item the shipping fees will not be refunded.

question: Why was my item redelivered to me instead of a refund?
answer:
Returned items will be redelivered to you if we cannot verify your reason for returning it. For example a microwave returned for not powering-on will be tested extensively and if the claims are right a refund will be processed but if during the test it powers-on the item will be redelivered to you.

Need more help ? Contact us here.

question: Can I exchange my item rather than get a refund?
answer: At the moment Jumia does not offer replacement or exchange of an item. However you can return an item and request a refund to be processed as a voucher. This will expedite the refund and you can use the voucher to purchase a replacement on Jumia.

question: I received something I didn't order. What now?
answer:
Oops! We apologise for this error. When you shop on Jumia you can be rest assured that you can return your product in most cases within 15 days for Jumia Official Stores items and 7 days for other eligible items.

To return a product please follow the simple steps below:

- Log in to your Jumia account
- Click on My Account in the top right corner of the Jumia homepage (Your name will appear here if you're logged in)
- Click on Orders in the drop-down menu
- Click on SEE DETAILS to the right of the item
- Click on REQUEST A RETURN and select your return reason
- Provide more information in the box provided
- Click on REQUEST RETURN then
- Select Jumia Store Credit for Refund Method Selection and SUBMIT
- Select your Pick-up or Drop-off address for Return Method Selection
- Then click on SUBMIT

To know more on how to request a return online click here

Need more help ? Contact us here.

question: What is Jumia Services?
answer: Jumia Services is our logistics services partners.

Jumia Express refers to items that are stored in Jumia's warehouse which ensures very fast delivery no out of stock cancellations and highest standards of quality storage. Jumia Express items are delivered with the same shipping charges as the other products and does not require any subscription. Choosing jumia express items ensures you get premium services without extra charges!
question: What is Jumia Express?
Is Jumia Express available for all products?
answer: Jumia Express is only available for selected products. To find out if a product is available on Jumia Express simply look for the Jumia Express logo on the product page.

question: Are there faster service options such as Jumia Express for returns?
answer: Our timelines for picking up your returned items are the same whether they are Jumia Express items or not. Please click here to see our return policy.

question: How do I pay on Jumia?
answer:
You can choose from one of the available payment methods on Jumia listed below.

- Pay on Delivery (Pay via POS or JumiaPay Post on delivery)
- JumiaPay
- Credit/Debit Card
- Voucher/Gift Card

You will be required to select your preffered payment option at checkout. To know more click here

Need help placing an order? Call our Order Line - 07006000000. Operating Hours: Monday - Sunday: 8am - 8pm.

Pay on Delivery (PoD) is a payment method where you can shop confidently on Jumia and pay for the item only at the time of delivery. With Pay on Delivery option you can pay via Jumia Pay on Delivery cash or with a valid naira bank card to the delivery agent and recieve your order.

Note: Some products regions or pickup stations may not be available for PoD. Please find a list of locations where Pay on Delivery is not available here. Also in exceptional cases and based on your past purchase history you may not be eligible for PoD.
question: What is Pay on delivery?
What is Jumiapay?
answer: JumiaPay is a new and free online payment service that enables you to send payments online securely instantly and cost-effectively. Click here to find out more about paying with JumiaPay.

question: How can I pay with my credit card?
answer: At the end of the checkout choose Credit / Debit Card as your preferred payment option and follow the steps after confirming your purchase. Make sure that your bank activated your Credit Card for online payments. Please note that Jumia provides the utmost security on your payments. To know more click .
We only accept Naira. Need help placing an order? Call our Order Line - 07006000000. Operating Hours: Monday - Sunday: 8am - 8pm.
question: What currencies does Jumia accept?
Are there any hidden or additional charges such as sales tax when I make a purchase on Jumia?
answer:
There are no hidden charges when you make a purchase on Jumia. The order amount is inclusive of all taxes and shipping fees. In case your order is delivered partially you will be required to pay only for the item that has been delivered to you. The order amount will be mentioned on the parcel and the invoice. Please note that we will never ask you to pay extra cash for the delivery.

Note: For International Payment via Credit / Debit card you may be charged a cross border fee by your issuing bank as our payment processor is based outside Nigeria. For information on the exact charges please contact your issuing bank.

question: What is my card number expiry date and CVV/security code?
answer:
When paying with Debit / Credit card on Jumia we will ask you for your 16 digit Card number and expiry date and CVV (Card Verification Value) / Security code. Please note that Jumia doesn't save your card information (unless you specify) or CVV information and you will be asked to enter it each time you purchase on Jumia.

Need help placing an order? Call our Order Line - 07006000000. Operating Hours: Monday - Sunday: 8am - 8pm.

The 3D Secure password is implemented by VISA and MasterCard in partnership with card issuing banks. 3D secure password is an additional one-time password that you will be asked to enter on the payments page. This password is known only to you and is sent to you via email or text. This ensures that only you can use your card securely for online purchases.
question: What is a 3D Secure password?

answer: Fraud detection and prevention are very important to us. We take all steps to ensure that transactions are genuine and that our customer's details are completely secure. Online payments are monitored continuously for suspicious activity and some transactions are verified manually if we feel that it is not authorized by the owner of the card.
question: What steps does Jumia take to prevent card fraud?
Why was my credit/debit card declined?
answer:
If you experience trouble completing payment through debit/credit card first thing to do is to make sure that your card is activated for online payments and that you have enough funds/ credit limit to complete the transaction. Your bank can help you verify these details and you can contact them directly.

Some cards issued outside Nigeria may not supported on Jumia and may be declined due to security reasons. Remember that you can complete your order through Pay on Delivery (PoD) which enables you pay at your doorstep or through other available mode(s) of payment (except for some very specific regions and pickup stations as well as for products shipped from overseas).

Need help placing an order? Call our Order Line - 07006000000. Operating Hours: Monday - Sunday: 8am - 8pm.

question: How do I use a gift card / voucher ?

answer:
If your Gift Card / Voucher value is less than the order amount you will be asked to select an additional payment method to complete the payment.

Need help placing an order? Call our Order Line - 07006000000. Operating Hours: Monday - Sunday: 8am - 8pm.
question: My order value is more than the Gift Card / Voucher amount what do I do now?

answer:
It could be due to any of the following reasons:

- You have in your cart a shipped from abroad item or a digital product (ex: ticket coupons) which in most cases are not eligible for Pay on Delivery.
- Your total cart value is less than the eligible amount.
- Your delivery option (Location or Pickup Station) is not eligible for Pay On Delivery.
- Pay on Delivery is currently disabled on your account basis your past purchase history with Jumia.
- The item mandatorily requires prepayment before processing.
question: Why can't I see the cash on delivery option when finalizing the order?

answer: That's easy! Please click here to learn how to withdraw from your Jumia account.

Do I need an account to purchase from Jumia?
answer: No you don't need to have an account to shop on Jumia. Need help placing an order? Call our Order Line - 07006000000. Operating Hours: Monday - Sunday: 8am - 8pm.

question: How do I register as a customer on Jumia?
answer:
That's easy! You can register as a customer on Jumia by following the simple steps below:

Visit our homepage
- Click on Login in the top right corner of the Jumia homepage
- Click on CREATE AN ACCOUNT with Email or Register with Facebook
- You will be asked to provide some basic information.
- Once you have provided the required information click on SUBMIT to complete the registration process.

We will send you an email to verify your account and welcome you to Jumia. Then you can start shopping from thounsands of stores and millions of items on Jumia.

Need help placing an order? Call our Order Line - 07006000000. Operating Hours: Monday - Sunday: 8am - 8pm.
Your e-mail address helps us to inform you in good time about your order. It also serves as a username and allows you to log in to your account.
question: Why do I have to provide my email address to register?
Can I add multiple email addresses to login to my account?
answer: To ensure that your account is always secure multiple email addresses cannot be added. However changing your current email address means changing your account.

question: How do I add a new delivery address to my account?
answer:
To add an additional shipping address to your account follow the simple steps below:

- Log in to your Jumia account
- Click on Your Account in the upper right corner of your screen (if you are logged in you will see your name there).
- Now click on Address Book on the left side of the screen.
- Click on ADD NEW ADDRESS then enter the details of the new address
- Click on SAVE.

To change your account password follow the simple steps below:

- Click on Your Account in the upper right corner of your screen (if you are logged in you will see your name there).
- In the Account overview area click on Change Password.
- Enter the required information and click on Submit.
question: How do I change my account password?
I forgot the password to my Jumia account. How can I access it?
answer:
To retrieve your account password please follow the simple steps below:

- Click on Login in the upper right corner of your screen.
- Enter your registered e-mail address and click on the Forgot your password? button to get an email on your registered account with instructions on how to set a new password.

question: Would my account be deactivated if I don't use it for a long time?
answer: We miss you when you don't visit us but we never deactivate your account unless you request it or for exceptional cases of customers with a very high order refusal rate.

question: How do I deactivate my account?
answer: We hate to see you leave! You can leave your account on hold and come back whenever you want. However if you still wish to deactivate your account please contact our customer service here.

These Jumia Prime Terms and Conditions set out the terms on which Jumia provides the Jumia Prime service and benefits to buyers on the Jumia marketplace including the eligibility criteria subscription process and applicable fees.

These Jumia Prime Terms and Conditions are subject to and governed by the Terms and Conditions of use of the Marketplace.

By subscribing to Jumia Prime members agree to these Jumia Prime Terms and Conditions as may be amended and published from time to time.
Jumia Prime is a loyalty programme that entitles its members to free delivery on Jumia orders and to access other exclusive promotions rewards and benefits.

Jumia Prime members receive free delivery on:
  • All Jumia orders EXCEPT items shipped from abroad (bearing Jumia Global tab) and bulky or large items such as large furniture large home/kitchen appliances home theaters sound systems and air conditioning units; and
  • all Jumia on-demand services e.g. Jumia Food.


If an order includes both qualifying and non-qualifying items buyers shall be required to pay applicable shipping charges for the non-qualifying items.

Due to restrictions on business/commercial use of Jumia Prime (particularized at section 4 below) we operate a monthly cap on free delivery. Members who exceed this cap will be classed as business/commercial users and their Jumia Prime membership may be canceled without notice.
category: What are the benefits of Jumia Prime?

tandc:
Jumia may offer rewards and benefits to members from time to time.These rewards and benefits shall be offered for a specified duration of timemembers will be informed of the validity of the rewards or benefits at the time they are offered. These rewards and benefits can only be used as Store Credits on any of Jumia platforms.

Jumia Prime also offers a platform for members to access promotions rewards and other benefits in respect of third party participating products and brands which Jumia may notify to members from time to time.

Benefits are provided by means of a voucher which may be redeemed directly with the participating third-party retailer in accordance with their own terms and conditions. Benefits may not be exchanged for cash or used to purchase any products or gift cards on Jumia.

Jumia may in its sole discretion add or remove Jumia Prime membership benefits.
Jumia will from time to time communicate to Prime members the savings that they receive.

category: Who is eligible for Jumia Prime?
tandc:
To qualify for Jumia Prime membership you must meet the following criteria at all times during the subscription period:
  • you must be located in a participating city as listed on the Jumia Prime Page of the application and website; and
  • you must be an individual as Jumia Prime is not intended for professional use which shall include the following:
    • business or corporate accounts;
    • JForce sales consultant accounts;
    • accounts with more than three (3) unique delivery addresses;
    • accounts that make more than twenty (20) orders in any given month via Jumia; or
    • accounts that make more than forty (40) orders in any given month via Jumia Food app.

In the event that your circumstances change and you cease to meet the eligibility criteria for Jumia Prime you shall be required to notify Jumia and your Jumia Prime membership shall be terminated with immediate effect.

Jumia reserves the right to refuse Jumia Prime membership to any customer in Jumia’s discretion.

category: How can I subscribe for Jumia Prime membership?
tandc:
Jumia Prime membership may be purchased via all Jumia applications and websites including Jumia Food and Jumia Pay.

Following purchase a confirmation email will be sent to the new member. Jumia Prime membership will be activated immediately with free delivery benefits applied across the Jumia and Jumia food applications and websites.

Jumia Prime membership is personal to the member and shall be used exclusively by the registered member and all Jumia Prime benefits shall accrue to the registered member only. Jumia Prime benefits are not transferable.

category: What is the price of membership?
tandc:
The Jumia Prime membership fee varies subject to your location and the duration of your chosen membership plan. Details are available on the “Free Delivery” page of Jumia’s website or application.

Payment for Jumia Prime may be made by credit debit card via Jumia Pay wallet or such payment method as Jumia may direct on its website and applications.

category: How long will my membership last?
tandc:
We offer the following membership plans:
  • One (1) calendar month;
  • three (3) calendar months;
  • six (6) calendar months; or
  • one (1) year.

The membership period commences on the date of confirmation. For example if you purchase your subscription and thereafter receive a confirmation email on 30th March and you choose a three month subscription your membership will expire at the end of the day on 29th June.

The renewal of Jumia Prime is not automatic. To enjoy continued Jumia Prime benefits when the membership period has ended a new Jumia Prime membership must be purchased.

Jumia Prime lifetime membership incorporates ten annual subscriptions only.

Jumia Prime lifetime membership is awarded exceptionally (it cannot be purchased).

Jumia may at any time and entirely in its discretion revoke Jumia Prime lifetime membership subject to compensation of the subscription value (based on prices at the time of revocation) for the remaining duration of the ten year membership term.

All Jumia Prime Terms and Conditions (including exclusion of professional use) shall apply to lifetime members. In the event of a lifetime member’s violation of these Jumia Prime Terms and Conditions or any applicable laws Jumia shall revoke membership without any compensation.

Your Jumia Prime membership is non-refundable and so if you cancel your membership you shall not be reimbursed in respect of subscriptions fees paid.

We may cancel your Jumia Prime membership at our discretion and without notice. If we do so we will give you a prorated refund by way of Store Credits based on the number of full months remaining in your membership.

We shall not however provide any refund for cancellation related to conduct that we determine is fraudulent or in violation of these Jumia Prime Terms and Conditions or any applicable laws.

We may cease or suspend the sale of new Jumia Prime memberships at any time at our discretion.
If you have any questions about these Jumia Prime Terms and Conditions please contact us using the contact form on our website.

Jumia strives to offer a seamless and user-friendly experience across our marketplace. However disputes between customers and sellers and/or Jumia will occasionally occur.

This policy provides guidance to customers on how to report issues or complaints and resolve disputes.

category: How can I report an issue or complaint?
tandc:
To report an issue or a complaint you may contact Jumia customer service by telephoning +234 01 888 1100; or by using live chat.

For fast and efficient resolution of specific types of issues listed below you can also use the email addresses and online contact forms listed below to reach the right team directly.

IssueContact
JumiaPay account related queries (including account closure) click here
Report security breaches and suspected frauds click here
Data privacy related requests Email to: Compliance.Alert@Jumia.com
Legal disputes Email to: Nigeria.Legal@Jumia.com
Report incorrect product information click here
Report infringing products click here

After you report and issue or a complaint Jumia shall take the following steps:

  1. Record the following information for purposes of keeping you updated and tracking the issue
    • your name and contact details; and
    • the nature of the issue
  2. Issue a reference number for the complaint for tracking purposes.
  3. Send you regular email updates on the steps taken to resolve the issue in the event that it is not resolved upon first contact.
  4. Notify you via email once the matter has been resolved and seek your confirmation of your level of satisfaction with resolution.
category: What happens after I report an issue or complaint?

tandc:
Jumia operates the escalation process set out below to ensure the timely and satisfactory resolution of all issues.

Where possible we will attempt to resolve issues at the first point of contact with the customer service team.

If our customer service team is unable to resolve your issue within 24 hours of your first contact a member of the issue resolution team will undertake an investigation.

The issue resolution team may request additional information from you and they will investigate the issue considering all relevant circumstances and information available. You will be informed of their findings within 48 hours of your first contact.

In the event that the issue is not resolved within 48 hours of your first contact it will be automatically escalated to the customer experience team as the final level of escalation. We endeavour to resolve all issues within 5 days of your first contact.
category: What happens if my issue or complaint is not resolved to my satisfaction?

tandc: Jumia will make every effort to contact sellers to resolve customer complaints on behalf of our customers. However if these efforts are unsuccessful customers may also request direct contact details for sellers by contacting customer service.
Any seller that fails to cooperate in good faith to resolve a customer's complaint may have its seller account restricted or terminated.
category: What if a seller refuses to cooperate in the dispute resolution process?

tandc:

  1. How to shop on Jumia
  2. Help with an order
  3. Request a return and refund

• Upon approval of each Easy Payment Plan application the cardholder must pay for the approved credit card transactions in the approved instalments over such number of months in the amounts as approve by the bank

• The Bank will bill the credit card account for the approved installments from the time the application is approved until full payment of all approved installments is made. The amount of all approved installments will be included in calculating the credit limit of the cardholder at any one time.

• Easy Payment Plan applications must be made within 3 working days from the date of the card transaction or within such other time we may allow and at least five (5) working days before the next credit card statement date.
• Easy Payment Plan is not applicable for any cash advance Credit Card as Source of Fund and such other promotions and transactions we may determine.
• We may require that Easy Payment Plan be applicable only to certain credit card transactions of a specified minimum value.

• Application for EPP must be made by the primary cardholder. The primary cardholder may apply for EPP for transaction amount on the primary and supplementary cards under his/her account. The cardholders are not eligible for EPP if the sum of credit used of all accounts under the primary cardholder exceeds his/her credit limit.

• The following transaction types are not eligible for EPP:
    • Disputed transactions of which their authenticity have been questioned by the cardholder; cash advance transactions; interests and all service fees (such as credit card annual fees cash advance transaction fees late payment fees over limit fees and other credit card charges) charged in accordance with the provisions in the Bank's Client Terms credit card terms user agreement and Bank’s Service and Price Tariff Guide.
    • Transactions that have not been posted to the cardholder’s account or have not been billed in the cardholder's statement.
    • Transactions the amount of which exceeds current balance for consumption. Current balance for consumption refers to any outstanding balance for consumption of all accounts (including both the primary and supplementary card accounts) under the primary cardholder as of the application date of the transaction instalment plan excluding any outstanding balance for cash advance transaction instalment statement instalment cash instalment or annual fee or interests.

• The cardholder may apply for single EPP from the date the credit card transaction has reflected in the credit card statement (usually 3 working days after the transaction) and at least five (5) working days before the next statement date. EPP takes immediate effect upon successful application by the cardholder. If after three (3) working days from the date of the credit card transaction the credit card statement does not reflect the credit card transaction the cardholder may apply for EPP within 1 working day from the date the credit card transaction reflects in the credit card statement but not later than five (5) working days before the next statement date.

• The amount of the transaction that the cardholder applies for the EPP will be the principal amount of the EPP. Cardholders cannot apply a partial amount of any single transaction as the principal amount.
category: Calculation of Principal Amount of EPP

tandc: • Instalment tenors refers to the number of installments opted by the cardholder. The cardholder may apply for 3 6 9 or 12-month installments or other tenors agreed between the bank and the cardholder.
category: Calculation of Principal Amount of EPP

tandc: • Interest on the Credit Card Easy Payment Plan (EPP) is charged at the variable interest rate of 18% per annum. The Interest shall be charged on the original principal balance of the EPP and spread equally across the Instalments of the EPP until payment in full. The Interest is calculated based on a 365 (three hundred and sixty-five) day year and 366 (three hundred and sixty-six) days for leap years.
category: Calculation of Principal Amount of EPP

tandc: • Subject to applicable law the interest rate may vary from time to time at the sole discretion of the Bank.
category: Calculation of Principal Amount of EPP

• The installment tenors and principal amount cannot be changed upon the cardholder's successful application of EPP. Outstanding installment balance shall not be eligible for further installment plan. The cardholder may apply for early pay-off of the outstanding installment balance. The cardholder shall pay in full the outstanding installment balance for the remaining tenors.
• If the cardholder wants to cancel his/her credit card during the installment he/she must first pay off all outstanding EPP balances before applying for the cancellation of the credit card.
• By agreeing to apply for the EPP the cardholder is deemed to have read understood and accepted these Terms and Conditions and agrees to be bound by them.

description: Place the item in its original packaging including any accessories tags labels or freebies. If you have created a password on the device you wish to return please ensure it is removed otherwise your return will be invalid.
title: Prepare the item
Drop Off the items or schedule a pickup
description: Return the item at our pickup stations or we can pick up from you within 1 - 4 business days. Always ensure your return slip is signed by our agents as your proof of return.
Once we receive your returned item we will inspect it and process your refund within 10 business days into your Jumia Store Credit. See our timelines here and refund policy for more information.
title: Refund processed

question: If my return gets validated how and when will I get my refund?
answer:
The refund process begins after we have completed the evaluation of your returned product. See information about our refund timelines here. We will send you an email notification once return examination is completed.

Your refund will be credited to your Jumia store credit. You can either use the store credit to make a new purchase or withdraw it into a bank account.
Payment methodsRefund methods
CashBank transfer or refund voucher
JumiaPayIf you have used a GTB Zenith Wema Stanbic and Access Bank credit/debit card your refund will be processed directly into your bank account. All other Jumia Store Credit payment methods will be credited in your Jumia store credit balance.
Voucher/SureGiftsVoucher

If you have used a GTB Zenith Wema Stanbic and Access Bank credit/debit card your refund will be processed directly into your bank account. After the refund has been processed by Jumia it may take up to 3 - 7 business days for your bank to credit the refund amount to your account.

question: How do I request a cash refund instead of store credit?
answer:
Jumia offers refunds to store credit as a convenience to our customers to ensure that refunds are processed quickly and securely and are immediately available to customers for further transactions on the Jumia marketplaces. If a customer would rather receive refunds via bank transfer to their bank account please contact us or use the withdraw feature in your account online. After verifying your identity and your Jumia account we will promptly issue a refund via bank transfer. It is not possible to redeem other forms of store credit via bank transfer.

You will also receive an email notification that your bank transfer has been successful once the transaction is completed. If the transfer is not reflected in your bank account after 24 hours please contact your bank.

If you completed your original order using JumiaPay and received store credit your Jumia store credit balance can be used on all Jumia platforms in one or more future purchases.

To access your Jumia store credit simply sign in to your JumiaPay account using your registered email and password and redeem it when you checkout on your next purchase. After you select Jumia Store Credit as your payment method you will notice that your available store credit is automatically displayed for you and can be applied to your order. If your Jumia Store Credit is lower than your order total you would be automatically asked to pay the balance using another payment method.
question: I have received my refund: how do I use my refund for future purchases?
I cannot see my refund but got an email with the subject Jumia Refund
answer: If you have paid using a GTB Zenith Wema Stanbic and Access Bank credit/debit card please be informed that the refund goes directly to the bank hence the reason for the email. But if you notice it's a fraudulent act or you have paid with other banks cards aside from those mentioned above please contact us by filling our web form.

question: What is a refund voucher?
answer:
Jumia Refund Voucher can be chosen as a refund method. The value is equal to the amount of the product purchased.

You can use a Jumia Refund Voucher as voucher code to buy any item. A refund voucher is valid for 180 days you need to use your voucher during this period. This refund voucher can be used on several purchases until your balance is 0.

If you have been issued a Jumia Refund Voucher you will have received a voucher number.

Please enter this voucher number in the voucher code box and click add voucher during checkout at payment step. A corresponding deduction will be applied to your total amount. Follow the steps below:

Kindly note: If you have more than one voucher code you can only use one code per order.
question: How do I use my voucher?
If my returned product is not validated for refund how do I get informed?
answer:
If your return is not cleared for refund then we will call you to explain the issue and send the item(s) back to you.

Please note that we will make 2 attempts to return the product to you. However after this we will cancel the return procedure and will keep the product with us for a maximum of 60 days for you to pick it up at Jumia warehouse after which it will be forfeited.

We always suggest our customers to accept the delivery of the return item and request for return again if not happy with the feedback.

Need more help ? Contact us here.

question: I have bought an item on promotion or with a voucher. What amount will you refund me?
answer:
For items purchased on sale the amount refunded will be the exact amount paid and not its original value.

For example: If you purchased an item on sale for NGN2000 and its original value was NGN4000 we will refund you NGN2000.

If you purchased an item with a Refund voucher we will refund you the sum of the amount you paid and the amount of the Jumia refund voucher.
Click here for details about refund timelines.

answer: The refunded amount will include the Delivery fees amount you were charged.
